entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
